title: 'Our Thing' Season 4: Episode 1 "A Button Guy"
description: Sammy, in his role as Underboss, is being sent on hit after hit and every button guy knows that's just not right. In Cosa Nostra an order is a fucking order, and it seems like John is giving them all to his Underboss.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
